::Zardus/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/Perndabot::

Flying through the air, Zardus realizes that he had forgotten to warn the 
maximals of the Alliance's 'interference'. He activates his comm-link.

"Maximals," he says, sending the transmission to all maximals, "My troops are 
on their way to help you. Do not open fire on them, they will crush you if 
you do."

Having said that, he turns around, surprised to see that only Reptilica and 
Bloodystrike were following him.

"Where is Perndabot?" he asks Reptilica.

"He stayed behind to activate the defences and put the shields to full 
power," the bot replies just as Perndabot comes running up.

"I set the autoguns on alert," he says, breathing heavily, "Put on the 
shields, and closed the door."

Zardus nods, "Excelent."

The four continue on their way toward the maximal commander and her friend.
